nodes.text: Ciption Lingsnot was an Adnerem male and member of the Lingsnot family. He was seen as a joy to his parents, although they expressed concern for him when he occasionally escaped into Virulent Reality. At every school quarter, Ciption made it into the Dean's List, a pride for the family—despite the fact that his brother Ussto was the major donor to the school—and was named All-Quadrant Detonator on Iron Filing Field. He planned to get a Transport License during Conception Day.

Ciption Lingsnot was mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
